opsgenie_api_key_desc: The API Key for Opsgenie integration
opsgenie_notify_only_desc: If disabled the message will be written to the channel
opsgenie_api_integration_key_desc: The API Integration Key for Opsgenie integration (required for creating alerts)
opsgenie_api_url_desc: Opsgenie API URL of the format https://api.opsgenie.com/v2/)
